SEARCH
Package com.nathcat.AuthCat

Class AuthCat

java.lang.Object
com.nathcat.AuthCat.AuthCat
public class AuthCat extends Object

An integration for making requests to the AuthCat service.

This class contains methods which will allow you to easily make requests to the AuthCat service for better integration with your applications.

Author:
Nathan Baines

  • Method Details

    • tryLogin

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject tryLogin(org.json.simple.JSONObject authEntry) throws IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidResponse
      Call the authentication service from AuthCat.
      Parameters:
      authEntry - The supplied authentication data, should contain a username and password field
      Returns:
      The JSON data returned by the service
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs when communicating with the service
      InterruptedException - Thrown if the connection with the service is interrupted
      InvalidResponse - Thrown if the service responds with an unexpected or invalid response code

    • loginWithCookie

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject loginWithCookie(String cookie) throws IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidResponse
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidResponse

    • userSearch

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject userSearch(org.json.simple.JSONObject searchData) throws IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidResponse
      Call the user search service
      Parameters:
      searchData - The JSON search data, must contain either a username field, or a fullName field, or both
      Returns:
      The JSON response from the server
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs when communicating with the service
      InterruptedException - Thrown if the connection with the service is interrupted
      InvalidResponse - Thrown if the service responds with an unexpected or invalid response
